text: Approval for the addition of six (6) catalogue items to the approved d114s over-the-wire balloon dilatation catheter product line.  These six items consist of a 10 mm balloon length in each of the current balloon diameters of 1.5 mm, 2.0 mm, 2.5 mm, 3.0 mm, 3.5 mm, and 4.0 mm.  In addition, approval for a minor dimensional change to the 1.5 mm diameter extruded balloon tubing (0.0135"/0.0205" id/od from the current 0.014"/0.022" id/od.  The device is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.
